堥字的基本解释

堥
máo
〔堥丘〕古同“旄丘”，前高后低的土丘。

堥
móu
〔堥敦〕小山，如“欲从堥堥，而度高乎泰山。”

堥
wǔ
瓦器，供煎药用。

堥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［máo］
［《廣韻》莫袍切，平豪，明。］
前高后低的山丘。
[②]［móu］
［《廣韻》莫浮切，平尤，明。］
(1)小陇。
(2)同“牟”。古代齐地称土釜。
[③]［wú］
［《集韻》微夫切，平虞，微。］
［《集韻》罔甫切，上噳，微。］
瓦器。

堥字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　堥； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页233第21
【廣韻】莫浮切【韻韻】迷浮切，?音謀。堆堥，小隴也。　又瓦器。【禮·內則】敦牟巵匜。【註】牟，讀曰堥。　又瓦合也。【周禮·天官】瘍醫凡療瘍，以五毒攻之。【註】五毒之藥，合黃堥，置石膽，丹砂，雄黃，礜石，慈石其中。燒三日夜，煙上著，以雞羽埽取，以治瘍。【楊億筆記】楊嵎因鄭玄黃堥五毒藥愈頰瘍。　又【集韻】微夫切，音無。與瓦器義同。

堥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
堥字的起名意思

暂无。

堥
Basic explanation of words
堥
máo
〔堥丘〕The ancient same "Yanqiu", a mound with high front and low back.
堥
móu
〔堥敦〕The hill is like "If you want to go from the 堥堥, the degree is higher than Mount Tai."
堥
wǔ
Pottery for decoction.
堥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［máo］
["Guangyun" Mo Paoqie, Pinghao, Ming. ]
The hills are high in the front and low in the back.
[②]［móu］
["Guangyun" Mo Fuqie, Ping You, Ming. ]
(1) Xiaolong.
(2) Same as "Mou". In ancient times, it was called earthen kettle.
[③] [wú]
["Jiyun" Weifuqi, Pingyu, Wei. ]
["Jiyun" cut, up and down, micro. ]
Pottery.
堥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　堥; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 233-21
[Guang Yun] Mo Fu cut [Rhyme] Fan float cut,? Yinmou. Duiyu, Xiaolong also.　 Pottery again. 【Rite·Inner】Dun Mouchan. [Note] Mou, read it as Bing.　Wahe also. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】Ulcer doctors treat ulcers with five poisons. [Note] The five poisonous medicines are combined with Huangxu, placed in stone gall, dansha, realgar, 礜石, and love stone among them. Burn it for three days and nights, put it on the cigarette, and take it with chicken feathers to cure the ulcer. [Notes by Yang Yi] Yang Wei cured cheek ulcers due to Zheng Xuan's five poisons.　[Jiyun] Weifuqi, no sound. It has the same meaning as pottery.
堥

堥
Name meaning
Nothing.
máo, móu, wǔ
I máo
前高后低的山丘。
II móu
1) 小陇。
2) 同“牟”。古代齐地称土釜。
III wú
瓦器。
